Text: Does anyone know when the next half of the season returns?
As far as I know the next episode is Car Conundrum on the 23rd of June.

Adam: "Hey Jamie, do you remember that time when we blew up that thingy?"
Jamie: "I shure do, it reminds med of when I was a concrete inspector. We used to... and bla bla" 

*Picture fades to an old clip that they have shown a hundred times before*

Adam: "That was a cool explosion we did bak then. Almost as fun as the time when we got drunk and made out whilst doing that drinking and cold myth."
Jamie: "Uuuh, eeem I thought we uuuh agreed never to talk about that... incident."
Adam: "Oh yeah... But you were right that time. With enough lubrication you can fit anything into anyone."
